meanings.sent1: She beshrewed the storm for ruining her picnic plans.
meanings.sent2: The old witch beshrewed the villagers who dared to trespass on her land.
meanings.sent3: As the cat knocked over the vase, Sarah beshrewed her clumsiness.
meanings.sent4: The dark wizard beshrewed the land, casting a curse that brought eternal darkness.
meanings.sent5: The pirate captain beshrewed the traitor who led their enemies to their hidden treasure.

meanings.definition: To express disapproval or annoyance towards someone or something.
meanings.sent1: He beshrewed the noisy neighbors for keeping him awake all night.
meanings.sent2: The teacher beshrewed the students for not completing their homework on time.
meanings.sent3: Tom beshrewed the rainy weather for canceling his outdoor birthday party.
meanings.sent4: The grumpy old man beshrewed the modern technology that he couldn't understand.
meanings.sent5: The chef beshrewed the poor quality of ingredients that ruined his signature dish.
